body_html: BTW, I ran all the tf tests under avx2 about 12 months ago, and there were several ops which gave incorrect answers or failed (alignment problems). At that point @benoitsteiner has fixed them in Eigen, but I'm not sure anyone tried testing advanced flags since then (it's not part of CI pipeline for sure), so there's a chance you get unexpected/incorrect results even if you make things compile

body: BTW, I ran all the tf tests under avx2 about 12 months ago, and there were several ops which gave incorrect answers or failed (alignment problems). At that point @benoitsteiner has fixed them in Eigen, but I'm not sure anyone tried testing advanced flags since then (it's not part of CI pipeline for sure), so there's a chance you get unexpected/incorrect results even if you make things compile
